Question
========

Two balanced dice are rolled. There are 36 possibilities in the outcome space. Determine the event *E* where the sum of two dice rolled is greater than 5 and all the upper eyes are even numbers. How many outcomes belong to event *E*?

Answerlist
----------

* 5
* 6
* 8
* 36

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 5: Incorrect
* 6: Incorrect
* 8: Correct
* 36: Incorrect
